Articles.Content:
As we all know, 1.10 releases on the 1st of July, and with it comes the ability to place decals all over the ship in many configurations. The decals can be different from each other  allowing the decals to be used for adding details to a ship itself.

So here is my request for a Decal Texture Pack that contains - Windows, doors, greebling textures, all sorts of flags, solid color wheels, pipes and other things that one would find on a space craft. I personally cannot texture something to fit with KSP's artstyle, hence my request for this mod given to anyone up for the challenge.

Thank you for reading this, and leave your suggestions for such a mod in the comments below.
